actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the graduated corporate tax rates shall apply in determining the tax imposed on certain campaign committees.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that graduated corporate tax rates apply in determining the tax imposed on the principal campaign committee of a candidate for Federal, State, or local elective office. (Currently, such tax is only imposed on such committees of candidates for congressional offices.)

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the graduated corporate tax rates shall apply in determining the tax imposed on certain campaign committees.
